org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc.support.cron
Interface CronExecutorService

All Superinterfaces:
Executor, ExecutorService
All Known Implementing Classes:
CronThreadPoolExecutor
public interface CronExecutorService
extends ExecutorService

Executor service that schedules a task for execution via a cron expression.

Method Summary

          Schedules the specified task to execute according to the specified cron expression.
